hero.title: César Garcés
hero.subtitle: Frontend Architecture
hero.description: I build scalable, performant, and maintainable frontend systems.
hero.description2: 8+ years of experience leading teams and defining standards in high-impact applications.

about.title: About
about.paragraph1: With over 8 years of experience as a Frontend Engineer, I've dedicated my career to building web and mobile applications that not only work, but scale and endure.
about.paragraph2: My approach combines clean architecture with performance and user experience. I've led teams in building e-commerce systems handling millions of transactions, real-time dashboards for critical decision-making, and mobile applications with millions of active users.
about.paragraph3: Beyond code, I specialize in defining standards, establishing testing practices, and creating observability systems that enable teams to build with confidence and scale safely.

impact.title: Measurable Impact
impact.description: Every technical decision is aligned with business objectives and success metrics.

leadership.title: Technical Leadership
leadership.description: I build teams, establish standards, and create a culture of excellence in frontend.

scalability.title: Scalability
scalability.description: I design systems that grow without compromising performance or maintainability.

skills.title: Skills &
skills.description: Technologies and tools I master to build world-class frontend systems

experience.title: Professional
experience.description: Journey building high-impact and scale frontend systems

achievements.0: Led frontend architecture of an e-commerce platform processing $50M+ annually
achievements.1: Implemented microfrontends system with Module Federation, reducing build time by 60%
achievements.2: Established testing standards that increased code coverage from 40% to 85%
achievements.3: Designed frontend observability system that reduced bug resolution time by 70%

0.scale: Millions of users, thousands of daily transactions

achievements.0: Built real-time dashboard for infrastructure monitoring with 10K+ metrics/s
achievements.1: Implemented global state architecture with Redux Toolkit + Sagas for complex apps
achievements.2: Optimized bundle size by 40% through strategic code splitting and lazy loading
achievements.3: Led migration of legacy codebase to React + TypeScript without downtime

achievements.0: Developed React Native applications for iOS and Android with 500K+ downloads
achievements.1: Implemented scalable push notification system for multiple clients
achievements.2: Created reusable design system that accelerated development by 50%
achievements.3: Optimized mobile app performance, significantly improving Core Web Vitals

2.scale: Multiple apps with hundreds of thousands of users

achievements.0: Built financial management web application from scratch with React
achievements.1: Implemented robust authentication and authorization with JWT and refresh tokens
achievements.2: Developed reusable components that became the foundation of the design system
achievements.3: Collaborated on defining scalable frontend architecture for rapid growth

3.scale: Core business application with thousands of active users

projects.title: Featured
projects.description: Complex systems built with solid architecture and focus on scalability

0.title: High-Performance E-commerce Platform
0.problem: Legacy e-commerce with performance and scalability issues, load times >5s and low conversion.
0.solution: Modern architecture with Next.js, microfrontends, and aggressive performance optimizations.

highlights.0: Reduced load time from 5s to 0.8s (Core Web Vitals: LCP < 1s)
highlights.3: Smart code splitting reduced initial bundle by 60%

0.architecture: Clean Architecture with layer separation, monorepo with Turborepo
0.impact: 35% increase in conversion, 50% reduction in bounce rate

1.title: Real-Time Observability Dashboard
1.problem: Need to monitor critical infrastructure with minimal latency and visualization of millions of metrics.
1.solution: React dashboard with WebSockets, rendering optimization, and large-scale data visualization.

highlights.0: Processing 10K+ metrics per second in real-time
highlights.2: Intelligent alert system with reduced false positives
highlights.3: Global state architecture with Redux Toolkit + Sagas

1.architecture: Event-driven architecture, separation of concerns, exhaustive testing
1.impact: Incident detection time reduced from 15min to 30s

2.title: Multi-Platform Mobile Application
2.problem: Need for native app for iOS and Android with shared code and native performance.
2.solution: React Native with scalable architecture, custom design system, and performance optimizations.

highlights.0: 500K+ downloads with average rating of 4.7+ stars
highlights.1: >90% shared code between iOS and Android
highlights.3: Bundle optimization and lazy loading reduced startup time by 40%

2.architecture: Feature-based architecture, centralized design system, automated CI/CD
2.impact: Simultaneous launch on both platforms, 60% reduction in bugs

3.title: Real-Time Notification System
3.problem: Notification system that didn't scale, with high latency and low reliability.
3.solution: Distributed system with WebSockets, queue management, and intelligent retry strategies.

highlights.1: Redis queue system to guarantee delivery
highlights.2: Exponential retry and circuit breakers for resilience

3.architecture: Event-driven architecture, message queue pattern, observability first

philosophy.title: Engineering
philosophy.description: Principles that guide every technical and architectural decision

cleanArchitecture.title: Clean Architecture
cleanArchitecture.description: Clear separation of responsibilities, well-defined layers, and unidirectional dependencies. Code should be predictable and easy to navigate.

details.1: Separation of concerns (UI, business logic, data)

performance.title: Performance First
performance.description: Performance is not a late optimization, it's a requirement from design. Every technical decision considers its performance impact.

details.1: Strategic code splitting and lazy loading
details.3: Core Web Vitals as key metrics

maintainability.title: Maintainability
maintainability.description: Code is read more times than it's written. I prioritize clarity, consistency, and documentation over "clever code".

details.4: Continuous refactoring, no technical debt accumulation

testing.title: Testing Culture
testing.description: Tests are not a checklist, they're a design tool. Writing tests first helps think about the API and edge cases.

dx.title: Developer Experience
dx.description: Good DX accelerates development, reduces bugs, and improves team satisfaction. Investment in tooling and standards pays dividends.

philosophy.quote: Excellence in frontend is not just about writing code that works. It's about building systems that scale, that are maintainable, and that empower teams to build with confidence.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Interested in collaborating? I'm open to opportunities at Big Tech and high-growth startups.
contact.connectDescription: I'm available for conversations about frontend architecture, technical leadership, or collaboration opportunities. Feel free to reach out.

form.messagePlaceholder: Tell me about your project or opportunity...
